content: worked seamlessly in bulky weight caron simply me yarn this wrap features a beautiful stripe and colorwork design that adds dimension and visual interest the pattern includes written instructions and a video tutorial to guide you through each step making it accessible to crocheters of all levels the wrap is reversible adding new interest to your wardrobe and the finished piece measures one size ensuring a comfortable fit for all the pattern is free on the blog or you can purchase the ad-free pdf here **unique features-** seamless construction stripes and colorwork design reversible written pattern with video tutorial
